Interviewer module¶

For simulate interview you can use the Interviewer class:

class Interviewer.Interviewer(questions_dict)¶

Interviewer class is used for representing a interview process

Attributes

Parameters:

questions_dict (int) -- dict with questions

Methods

interview_process()

Asking, taking answer, take grade reaction

verdict()

Writes human/replicant verdict ti output

ask_question()

Qsks questions and takes answers

grade_answer_reaction()

Grades every reaction

grade()

Grades every reaction

ask_question(key)¶

Qsks questions and takes answers

Parameters:

key (string) -- key to question

grade(reaction)¶

Grades every reaction

Parameters:

reaction (Reaction) -- object of concret reaction

grade_answer_reaction()¶

Grades every reaction

interview_process()¶

Asking, taking answer, take grade reaction

verdict()¶

Writes human/replicant verdict ti output

Voight-Kampff test
